entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023
